title: From Taylor Swift to the World Cup, travelers are paying big bucks to catch overseas games and shows
description: Fueled by a YOLO mentality following years of pandemic-era lockdowns, more are traveling to attend music, sports and other major events.

title: Cohabitating after separating? The arrangement is not uncommon, says marriage therapist: Here's why it can be successful
description: More couples are embracing a softer transition out of marriage, says psychologist Lisa Marie Bobby

title: 28-year-old social media manager in Norway is required to take 3 weeks of vacation in summer: 'Work is not everything'
description: Lene Vindenes is a social media manager in Norway and has a "clear routine" of how she prepares to go on vacations for weeks at a time.

title: The 10 rules of 'Ikigai,' from authors of the Japanese ‘secret’ for ‘a long and happy life’
description: Ikigai is a purpose in your life that can keep you going and boost your happiness, according to Héctor García and Francesc Miralles. Here are the rules of it.

title: Bill Gates says Warren Buffett taught him to value free time: Filling ‘every minute of your schedule’ doesn’t make you more serious
description: Bill Gates said he used to think leaders filled every minute of their days working toward success, until he saw Warren Buffett's calendar.

title: Yellen says 'direct' and 'productive' Beijing talks a step forward in putting U.S.-China ties on 'surer footing'
description: Yellen is the second member of the Biden administration to visit Beijing after Secretary of State Antony Blinken's visit last month.
